Package game.controller

Class Game4GewinnController

java.lang.Object
game.controller.Game4GewinnController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGame4GewinnController
public class Game4GewinnController extends Object implements IGame4GewinnController
A Controller implementation for a GUI view. This controller creates and uses a game model from package game.model. It implements a state machine to keep track of the state the view should draw next.
Author:
Yohanes Kirana

  • Constructor Details

    • Game4GewinnController

      public Game4GewinnController(IGame4GewinnView view, int width, int height)
      Creates a new controller object with the given view and size
      Parameters:
      view - The view object that should be used by the controller. Cannot be change later.
      width - The width of the game field.
      height - The height of the game field.

  • Method Details

    • nextFrame

      public GameState nextFrame()
      Calls the draw methods of view, depending on current game state. During the game, this method also check if the game is over.
      Specified by:
      nextFrame in interface IGame4GewinnController
      Returns:
      State that is displayed.
